attributes.action: Legalize all drugs to reduce crime around the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If all drugs are legalized the reduction in gun and gang crime would be huge. Let all drugs be freely available, if people want to kill themselves with it thats fine, its thier own choice. Just provide warning as is done with alcahol and smoking. This will put a stop to underground gangs and crime around the UK!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
